Articles.Content: Does anyone know if anything changed with Mechjeb. For two days now it has been acting crazy. Never had an issue til then and nothing has changed on my system. Just curious if it was just me or if anyone else is having issues?
Have you downloaded the latest dev version and tested it out? Have you checked in the MechJeb thread, or asked for help there? If you did ask for help there, did you include the required log files?
Kind of new to the forums. I didn't know there was a Mechjeb thread, I will look for it and try there. Sorry

No worries, mate. There's tons of information here and it can be a daunting task to find what you're looking for. If you can't find the thread, let me know and I'll send you the link. 

Better yet, here you go - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111978-113-anatid-robotics-mumech-mechjeb-autopilot-258-22-jun-2016/

Your best bet is to look for the latest dev build. You'll probably find your problem has been fixed in the latest compile.

Edited July 6, 2016 by Jack Wolfe
